title: Rebuild and redeploy Fauji Finance to fix 'Canister ID Not Resolved' on live link

requirements.text: Investigate and resolve why the live URL `https://faujifinance.icp0.io` shows the Internet Computer error "Canister ID Not Resolved" on mobile, then rebuild and redeploy the Fauji Finance site so the live URL reliably loads the website again.

quotes:
is link se open nhi hora h
canister id not resolved aara h

acceptanceCriteria: Opening `https://faujifinance.icp0.io` on mobile loads the Fauji Finance Home page (no "Canister ID Not Resolved" error).
No unexpected 404s occur for core static assets required by the Home/Services/Contact pages when tested on the deployed site.

requirements.text: After redeployment, perform a production smoke test on the live deployment URL following `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md`, focusing on routing, asset loading under the deployed base path, and mobile responsiveness.
acceptanceCriteria: All checks in `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md` sections 1â€“6 pass on the live deployment URL.
Browser console shows no JavaScript errors and no failed network requests for required assets on Home, Services, and Contact.
Mobile viewport testing confirms layout remains responsive and key CTAs (Call/WhatsApp sticky bar and buttons) remain usable.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only components).
Do not modify immutable hook entrypoints: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` if an upgrade requires state migration.
nonGoals: Do not add new pages or change site navigation beyond what is required to restore the live deployment.
Do not introduce new authentication providers (Internet Identity only, if auth is used at all).
Do not add external databases or third-party backend services.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for user-facing text in build requests.
